pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Aligning with the Customer’s Needs</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">We will be using a variety of metrics – number of patient visits per month, average patient wait time, and frequency of patient follow-up visits due to ineffective treatments. Our goal is to grow our patient base and increase our efficiency, both without increasing our staff. It’s an ambitious target, but with the right strategies, I think we can make it happen.</welcomeText>
